title: Button Douglass New Book The Everyday Millionaire's Guide to Low Market Risk and Steady Returns is a Brilliantly Crafted Guidebook to Sound Financial Planning
text:
Recent release “The Everyday Millionaire's Guide to Low Market Risk and Steady Returns” from Page Publishing author Button Douglas provides expert advice on prudent long-term investing.
(PRWEB) October 19, 2015
Button Douglas, a previous professional engineer and now financial manager for himself, has completed his new book “The Everyday Millionaire's Guide to Low Market Risk and Steady Returns”: an educational work on investing in the world of secular markets.
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Button Douglas’s highly informative book provides the reader with necessary knowledge in respects to long-term market trends. It is filled with advice on how to analyze these trends, assess risk, and attain prosperity with minimal uncertainty.
This is the book that many on Wall Street may not want conservative investors to be aware of as it may affect their interest in unknowingly participating in secular bear markets.
Conversely, many on Wall Street may be aware of the secular markets but not fully aware of secular bear market dynamics. Within the context of this book, many financial writers and television pundits often convey some pretty silly concepts about long-term market averages.
The book was written for those who do not need to take excessive risk with what has already been hard earned. It will also be useful for newcomers and intermediates to the markets in evaluating risk. For the more adequately funded with hands on inclinations, a clearer picture of risk is presented.
Readers who wish to experience this educational work can purchase “The Everyday Millionaire's Guide to Low Market Risk and Steady Returns” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
For additional information or media inquiries, contact Page Publishing at 866-315-2708.
About Page Publishing
